name: Sistermon Blanc (Awakened)
effect: [On Play] You may place 1 [Sistermon Blanc] from your hand or trash at the bottom of this Digimon's digivolution cards to ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞. (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.) [On Deletion] Return 1 card with [Jesmon], [Huckmon], or [Sistermon] in its name other than [Sistermon Blanc (Awakened)] from your trash to your hand.
